overview: Lee Lung witnessed the murder of his parents by the ruthless bandit Shek King who in turn abducted Lee's infant sister. Lee wanders the land and learns martial arts from a drunken master. Once his skills are perfected, Lee sets out in search of his long lost sister and the villain Shek King.
tagline: DRAGON LEE Brutalizes his enemy...The Most Explosive Kung Fu Adventure EVER!
title: The Dragon's Infernal Showdown
